Articles.Content:
I just stumbled upon a funny comics where the planets in our Solar system are represented as girls who interact with each other. Some of it are rather funny.

Here's, for example, an episode about New Horizons mission:

More here:

https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.599756116730629.1073741826.599732730066301&type=3

Original in Russian:

http://acomics.ru/~celestial-cuties
